item.title: Adding a npc that talks... help i keap geting errors
item.dc:creator: @LittleMaffia LittleMaffia
item.description:
@LittleMaffia wrote:

Step 1 : Search for ‘‘moo’’

Step 2 : Under the last } add

else if (npcs[i].npcType == NPCID) { if (misc.random2(10) <= 3) //this is the time delay { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("YOURNAME")) { npcs[i].textUpdate = "Admin YOURNAME is online!"; } else { npcs[i].textUpdate = "Admin YOURNAME is offline!"; } } }

save compile and start server!

Read full topic

item.title: Adding a npc that talks... help i keap geting errors
item.dc:creator: @newservermaker newservermaker
item.description:
@newservermaker wrote:

i sec[br][size=1]Posted on: July 30, 2007, 10:26:44 AM[/size][hr]NPCHandler.java:1529: ‘else’ without ‘if’
}else if (npcs[i].npcType == 21)
^
NPCHandler.java:1529: ‘]’ expected
}else if (npcs[i].npcType == 21)
^
NPCHandler.java:1529: ‘;’ expected
}else if (npcs[i].npcType == 21)
^
NPCHandler.java:1529: expected
}else if (npcs[i].npcType == 21)
^
NPCHandler.java:1546: illegal start of expression
public void println(String str) {
^
5 errors
Press any key to continue . . .

r the errors

item.title: Adding a npc that talks... help i keap geting errors
item.dc:creator: @newservermaker newservermaker
item.description:
@newservermaker wrote:

i put in this: for a hero that talks and it gets 5 errors when i complie

else if (npcs[i].npcType == 21) { if (misc.random2(10) <= 3) //this is the time delay { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("Diefool")) { npcs[i].textUpdate = "Diefool is ONLINE"; } else { npcs[i].textUpdate = "Diefool is OFFLINE"; }
what am i doing wrong?

NPCHandler.java:1529: 'else' without 'if' }else if (npcs[i].npcType == 21) ^ NPCHandler.java:1529: ']' expected }else if (npcs[i].npcType == 21) ^ NPCHandler.java:1529: ';' expected }else if (npcs[i].npcType == 21) ^ NPCHandler.java:1529: <identifier> expected }else if (npcs[i].npcType == 21) ^ NPCHandler.java:1546: illegal start of expression public void println(String str) { ^ 5 errors Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic
